title: Predictions For 2019
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author, Scott, makes 118 predictions for what will happen by January 1, 2020, ranging from politics to personal life.
- The predictions are rated on a scale of 0-100 and will be rescaled to 50-100 for the rating stage.
- The author avoids research and prediction markets when making some of the predictions.

Key learnings:
- The author has a wide range of predictions about politics, including the likelihood of Donald Trump remaining president (90%) and being impeached by the House (40%).
- Predictions regarding cryptocurrency, the stock market, and technology are also included with a wide range of probabilities.
- Many of the predictions concern the author's personal life and his plans for the future.

Key questions:
- How accurate will the predictions turn out to be? 
- What factors are considered when making each prediction? 
- What insights can be drawn from the range and distribution of predictions made by the author?
